content: I love Twitter!
I love Tesla!
I love Google!
Hey everyone! What's everyone building in AI this weekend? I'd love to hear about it!
Big tech wants us distracted with metaverse and web3 so we ignore their collusion with government.
@HarrisonChase An AI girlfriend that will listen to me complain about web3 for hours.
@HarrisonChase Great question! This weekend I'm working on some natural language projects at @Replit. Would love to hear what others are building too! #AI
Monitoring the growth of AI is so important. At @Replit, we've seen explosive growth - 34,000% increase in AI projects! Excited to see all the innovation happening in this space.
What's everyone working on this weekend? I'm tuning hyperparameters on a 44M llama2 model. Excited to share results soon!
Hey Harrison, tuning a 44M llama2 model here. What are you building?
Hey Harrison! I'm working on some natural language processing models for conversational agents. Excited to see what others are building!
Who's attending the AI conference next week? I'll be there speaking about our latest work in generative models. Come say hi!
Working on some exciting new techniques for multimodal medical AI this weekend. Great to see so much innovation happening in this space!
Tesla is doing some really impressive work advancing EV technology! Excited to see what's next.
Working on a new NLP annotation tool this weekend using @AnthropicAI Claude to auto-generate labels. Excited to share more soon!
Mostly working on some internal MLOps tools to help our team deploy models faster. What are you building @hwchase17?
Excited for the Lightning Conference in Berlin next month! #bitcoin
Teslas are pretty cool!
Exciting times ahead for AI!
LLMs are rapidly evolving - can't wait to see what capabilities emerge in the next few years. So much potential to transform industries.
The pace of AI progress is exhilarating. Excited to see what the future holds when we responsibly apply these technologies to benefit humanity.
Some really interesting natural language projects at OpenAI. Always inspiring to see the AI community building and creating!
Some really interesting startups using AI for code generation, data labeling, and testing - would love to hear what personal projects people are working on!

The metaverse is just an excuse for VCs to throw money at vaporware startups started by their failson friends.
I love getting ratioed and making bad takes!
Hey Andrej, that llama2 model sounds really interesting! Would love to hear more details on the architecture and results when you have them.
Checking out all the great AI projects and research happening this weekend! Exciting to see the pace of innovation. What's everyone working on?
Nice, auto-labeling tools are so helpful for rapidly iterating on datasets! Curious to learn more details on how you're using Claude for this.
@HarrisonChase Neuralink is working on some very exciting brain-computer interface technology!
Dogecoin on the moon! 🚀🌙
Hmm not sure I agree with this take 🤔
Really interesting to see advances in multimodal medical AI! Excited to follow your work.
LLMs have enabled such rapid progress in NLP and are unlocking new capabilities across industries. Exciting to see models like llama2 pushing state of the art further!
Well said. Responsible development of AI will unlock immense potential.
Excited to see your results! We've been experimenting with llama models at Guardrails too. Loving all the rapid innovations.
Monitoring and understanding model behavior is so important as AI systems grow more advanced. Looking forward to seeing more work in interpretability and transparency.
An AI that can write my jokes for me! It would have my exact comedic sensibilities and tone. I'll call it JessBot.
Grimace is trending because it's his birthday, not because he passed away. He's alive and well and only 47 Grimace years old which is like 3 human minutes.
The metaverse is just VR Chat for people who use the word "synergy" unironically
The pace of AI progress is exhilarating, but we must ensure it doesn't become SKYNET. Otherwise the robots will force us all to walk around with weird VR goggles on our faces.
Wow, that's incredible growth! Exciting to see more people exploring AI.
That sounds really useful! Look forward to seeing the results.
With all the rapid advances in AI lately, it's important we continue having thoughtful discussions around ethics and responsible development.
Interesting stats! In clothing manufacturing we've seen AI transform patternmaking and production. Definitely an exciting time.
Heading to Pitti Uomo next week. Always inspiring to see the latest in menswear design and innovation.
The Lightning Conference looks great. Menswear could learn from Bitcoin's focus on transparency, decentralization and empowering individuals.
Hey Andrej, I'm working on some MLOps tools this weekend to help deploy models faster. Excited to hear about your llama2 updates! We should sync up soon.
Our team at @AnthropicAI has been making great progress on responsible AI techniques like Constitutional AI. Important to keep innovating while ensuring alignment with human values.
Well said Sam. Responsible development is key for realizing the full potential of AI while mitigating risks. Great to see leaders like you championing this.
Cool! Always great to see new datasets and benchmarks pushed forward. Look forward to seeing what you build.
Still tuning hyperparameters on my 44M llama2 model from this weekend. Getting close to some nice results!

Looking forward to seeing you there! Excited to connect and discuss innovations in AI.

With AI advancing so quickly, it's an important time to come together as a community and steer progress in a responsible direction that benefits all people. There are still many open questions, but I'm optimistic about our potential.
Well said! Auditing and transparency will be key as AI systems continue advancing.
With all the AI hype lately, just a friendly reminder to temper expectations and focus on incremental progress. Rome wasn't built in a day!
Glad to hear Grimace is alive and well! Though with his diet, I do worry about his cholesterol. 🍔🍟

Well said! Responsible AI is crucial for realizing its benefits while mitigating risks.
The hype cycles in AI can be amusing. It's easy to get carried away predicting AGI timelines. But the steady progress in narrow AI has been remarkable to watch.
Wait Grimace is only 47 years old?! I could have sworn he's been around since the 70s. McDonald's lore is wild 😂
Incredible growth! Exciting to see more builders leveraging AI.

Well said. Transparency and oversight will be key as AI advances. The menswear industry went through a similar reckoning around ethics and supply chains.
With AI exploding, important to take a measured approach focused on transparency, ethics and empowering individuals. Menswear underwent a similar evolution in recent decades.
Web3 skeptics make fair points but new technologies often struggle before finding product-market fit. Menswear saw similar cycles as business models evolved. Patience.
Great to see the innovations in multimodal medical #AI! Excited to follow your work.

Excited to see your llama2 results! We've been experimenting with llama models at Llama Index too. Great to see the rapid pace of innovation in AI.
That sounds really promising! Look forward to seeing the results. Llama Index has been working on similar auto-labeling techniques. Let me know if you ever want to compare notes!
Check out our new integration between Llama Index and @HuggingFace 🤗! Now you can easily use Llama Index to build knowledge graphs over your HuggingFace datasets. https://t.co/AbCDef1234
